videos.title: The Watermoo 2022 gravel race. MGRS.
videos.description: Fantastic gravel race in Dexter, Michigan. Part of the Michigan Gravel Race Series. It was difficult cutting the video down to a little over two minutes so if you want so see more of the course register for 2023! Race photos taken by and purchased from Rob Meendering. See all his great work at robmeenderingphotography.com.

videos.title: The Watermoo 2023
videos.description: 112 miles gravel race in Dexter, Mi

videos.title: Watermoo Race Review
videos.description:
STS visited the Watermoo Gravel Race in Dexter, Mi. If you are looking for a great 100 mile challenge, this is the one.

www.stsbicycles.com

https://www.facebook.com/STSBicycles

https://www.instagram.com/sts_gravelbikes/

https://share.epidemicsound.com/ijmkqi

Gear used - Sony EV10, Nikon Z30, GoPro Hero 11, DJI Mini, Zoom H6 for sound, Hollyland Lark Max


#custompaint #cycling #gravelbike #madeinusa #steelisreal #cyclinglife #michigan 

www.stsbicycles.com 

https://www.facebook.com/STSBicycles 
https://www.instagram.com/sts_gravelbikes/# 
https://www.michigangravelraceseries.com/
